name: The Escapists - Escape Team
description: NOTICE: Requires the base game The Escapists in order to play. Activation key must be used on a valid Steam account, requires internet connection.  ABOUT THE GAME			Locked in a military prison for crimes they did not commit, the 4 members of the Escape team must work out how to break free from an Escape proof military prison. Maybe the rumours that the compound houses the fiercest tank in history will help?SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
